answers.text:
Hi Brian, 
Here are a few resources that should help answer your question!
•   This article from ICMA’s June 2011 magazine gives examples of various ways to either archive emails or store them in external areas so that in-boxes can be kept clean but the emails are easily retrieved in care they are needed at a later date. http://webapps.icma.org/pm/9305/public/pmplus1.cfm?title=Business%20Risks%20of%20E-mail%20and%20the%20Impact%20of%20Employment%20Law&subtitle=E-mail%20overload%20can%20be%20a%20major%20issue.&author=Dave%20Hunt
•   This is a previously asked question about email storage where various members discuss cloud based email storage solutions http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/20630/Google_Apps_for_Local_Government
Hope this helps! 
Best, 
Robin
